text: She recently revealed she is indeed engaged after starring as The Bachelorette. And Rachel Lindsay was more than happy to show off the dainty silver band she's been wearing as a placeholder for her actual Neil Lane engagement ring during an appearance on Extra in Universal City on Tuesday. The 32 - year - old lawyer - reality star looked so in love and gorgeous in a chic black tank top, trousers and silver chain belt. Has a nice ring to it! Rachel Lindsay was more than happy to show off the dainty silver band she's been wearing as a placeholder for her actual Neil Lane engagement ring during an appearance on Extra in Universal City on Tuesday Wearing her raven locks down in loose curls, the reality star couldn't stop smiling as she promoted the show on which she found her fiancee
